Body:
current_datetime = datetime.now(tz=tzlocal()).replace(minute=0, second=0,
    microsecond=0)
cron = doccron.cron(
    """CRON_TZ=Asia/Manila
    0 */2 * * *
    CRON_TZ=UTC
    0 1-23/2 * * *"""
    )
assert isinstance(cron, Iterator)
for i in range(1, 6):
    next_schedule = next(cron)
    assert isinstance(next_schedule, datetime)
    assert next_schedule == current_datetime + timedelta(hours=i)
